channel.title: Hugo on Sorush Khajepor - Numerical programming and app development
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Sorush Khajepor - Numerical programming and app development

item.title: Create a table of content from headings of a Hugo post
item.description: Goal I want to write code to get a table of content (ToC) for each blog post automatically. It is created and shown on the right-hand side of the content of a post.

item.title: How to add a video to a Hugo post
item.description: I want to add a video to a Hugo blog post. The video is hosted on my website, so it is not a Youtube or Vimeo.
